alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:25PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Stillwater and southeastern Sweet Grass Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 17 miles west of Absarokee, or 27 miles south of Big Timber, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Absarokee, Reed Point, Nye, Fishtail and Dean. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for south central Montana.
